body_html:
@drpngx @sb2nov The Jenkins failure is for real, though I am not able to reproduce with my local dev machine from the command line bazel test -s --config=opt --verbose_failures //tensorflow/core/kernels:all yet.

I will take a look at the Jenkins setup and see if I could reproduce with:

export USER=jenkins
export TF_BUILD_CONTAINER_TYPE=CPU
export TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION=PYTHON2
export TF_BUILD_IS_OPT=OPT
export TF_BUILD_IS_PIP=NO_PIP
export TF_BUILD_APPEND_CI_DOCKER_EXTRA_PARAMS=-e TF_BUILD_FILTER_INSTALL_TESTS_BY_TAG=-manual
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh

body:
@drpngx @sb2nov The Jenkins failure is for real, though I am not able to reproduce with my local dev machine from the command line `bazel test -s --config=opt --verbose_failures //tensorflow/core/kernels:all` yet.

I will take a look at the Jenkins setup and see if I could reproduce with:
```sh
export USER=jenkins
export TF_BUILD_CONTAINER_TYPE=CPU
export TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION=PYTHON2
export TF_BUILD_IS_OPT=OPT
export TF_BUILD_IS_PIP=NO_PIP
export TF_BUILD_APPEND_CI_DOCKER_EXTRA_PARAMS=-e TF_BUILD_FILTER_INSTALL_TESTS_BY_TAG=-manual
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh
```
